definitions: A floor of a ship, especially the upper, open level extending for the full length of the vessel.
A floor or platform resembling or compared to a ship's deck.
A floor of a double-decker bus.
A timber platform or terrace attached to a house or other building.
The flat part of a skateboard or snowboard.
A component or unit for playing or recording records, tapes, or compact discs.
A set of two or more record decks connected to sound mixing equipment, used by a DJ.
